name: Consumed!
description:
Criteria #1: Endless Runner : Constantly moving through an endless stage

-The player runs through a goblin encampment, never ending, just increasing gets harder.

#2: Fantasy: Fictional universe, locations, events and/or people.

-A Goblin Encampment

Criteria #3: Devil May Care: Very reckless or careless.

- Eat goblins, spit out their flesh to kill at long range, unlock doors, all while trying to avoid rolling logs and goblin mages.

Criteria #4: Epic Music:  Music sung by a choir.

- Epic Choir Music for background.

Asset Descriptions..
Graphics - done by me and a pixel editor.
Sound Clips - From Humble Bundle purchased sound bites. Most were then altered to get the desired sound.
Background Music - Veni, veni, venias by MIT Concert Choir.

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/us/
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/MIT_Concert_Choir/Carmina_Burana_Carl_Orff/20_...

Changes: 8 seconds of the end was removed.
